name: HRus
tag_list: human-resource, human-resource-portal, human-resource-israel, human-resource-site, human-resource-newsletter, hr
overview:
HRus is the leading Human Resource portal Israel and the whole Middle East region.

HRus talk about all things related to Human Resource - from news to professional articales. As a leader in the filed HRus also produce conferences and HR courses.

HRus is a platform that provide the HR community with the information and set of tools they need in order to succeed while creating a united professional team that is ready, willing and able to stand up to the new challenges that lay ahead.
